H0.text: What is zoophobia a fear of. The Zoo

H1.text: What is zoophobia a fear of. Zoologists

H2.text: What is zoophobia a fear of. Zooplankton

H3.text: What is zoophobia a fear of. Animal

A4.text: Zoophobia, or animal phobia, is the irrational fear or aversion towards non-human animals.

A5.text: Zoophobia is the general negative reaction to animals, but it is usually divided into many subgroups, each being of a specific type of zoophobia.
